alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued August 08 at 12:12PM PDT until August 09 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For San Diego County deserts, strongest winds expected along the I-8 grade into Imperial County.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Blowing dust could reduce visibility at times.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
